inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: histopathologic confirmation of malignant glioma from resection specimen. Diagnosis must be consistent with either GBM, AA, or malignant mixed OA.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1,500/mm³ Hemoglobin ≥ 10 gm/dL Platelets ≥ 100,000/mm³

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient must understand the investigational nature of this study and its potential risks and benefits, and sign an approved written informed consent prior to performance of any study-specific procedure.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient initially presented with RLE weakness where his right knee gave out with difficulty walking and right anterior thigh numbness
